mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM mscode_sys_user WHERE id != #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT msr.role_code AS "roleCode" FROM mscode_sys_role msr,mscode_sys_role_user msru,mscode_sys_user msu WHERE msr.id = msru.role_id AND msu.id = msru.user_id AND (msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR msu.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT CAST(id AS CHAR) AS "id",menu_path AS "path",menu_component AS "component",menu_code AS "name",menu_icon AS "icon",(CASE WHEN menu_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "hideInMenu",CAST(parent_id AS CHAR) AS "parentId" FROM mscode_sys_menu WHERE id IN (SELECT menu_id FROM mscode_sys_role_menu mrm WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM mscode_sys_role msr,mscode_sys_role_user msru,mscode_sys_user msu WHERE msr.id = msru.role_id AND msu.id = msru.user_id AND msr.id = mrm.role_id AND (msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR msu.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))) ORDER BY menu_sequence ASC

SELECT mrm.menu_button AS "menuButton" FROM mscode_sys_role_menubutton mrm WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM mscode_sys_role msr,mscode_sys_role_user msru,mscode_sys_user msu WHERE msr.id = msru.role_id AND msu.id = msru.user_id AND msr.role_code = mrm.role_code AND (msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR msu.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mscode_sys_user (id, username, nickname, password, email, mobile, prefix, org_id, province_regioncode, city_regioncode, status) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{provinceRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
